spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room zoning roughly matches (balcony-left, living central-left, kitchen/utility top-right, toilet mid-right, bedroom bottom-right), but several plan-to-render mismatches exist. Door locations/orientations do not consistently follow the 2D plan (notably the main entry and interior doors). Window placement is inconsistent (living-side window appears missing/relocated). Several proportions look off (balcony depth and corridor/transition space appear enlarged vs the plan; bedroom furniture orientation suggests altered usable proportions).

structural_fidelity.notes: Primary adjacencies are mostly preserved (kitchen adjacent to utility; toilet above/adjacent to bedroom; balcony off living). Wall thickness looks generally consistent. However, the render introduces/expands a hallway-like zone and adds built-in/storage elements not clearly present in the 2D plan, reducing fidelity. Some doors appear embedded/placed differently than the plan indicates.

furniture_mapping.notes: Living/dining furniture is broadly consistent (sofa + round dining table; balcony access via glazing). Bedroom furniture does not clearly match the plan’s layout/orientation (bed placement/orientation appears different; added desk/storage not shown). Furniture scale looks mostly plausible relative to rooms, but the altered circulation space suggests layout drift.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is clean and visually clear with good lighting and readable geometry. Camera isometric-like but appears perspective rather than a strict orthographic/isometric projection. Minimal artifacts; overall presentation quality is good despite plan fidelity issues.

detected_errors.description: Main entry door placement at the top-left (as in the 2D plan) is not clearly represented or appears shifted/omitted in the 3D render.
Interior door placement between living/passage and bedroom/toilet appears different from the 2D plan’s door positions (hallway/door alignment drift).
At least one interior door swing/orientation (toilet/bedroom) appears inconsistent with the 2D plan’s swing direction and opening side.
Living room window on the left exterior wall shown in the 2D plan is missing or replaced by a solid wall in the 3D render.
Balcony and adjacent living edge proportions appear distorted (balcony depth/overall balcony footprint looks larger relative to living than in the 2D plan).
The corridor/transition space between living and bedroom/toilet is enlarged/reshaped compared to the compact passage implied in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated/unsupported built-in storage/rack element in the corridor/near bedroom (large open rack/closet-like feature) not indicated in the 2D plan.
Bedroom furniture layout/orientation (bed position/orientation) does not match the 2D plan’s depicted arrangement.
